notes: This map illustrates structural changes within the West of the town of Geti in Province Orientale, DRC occurring between 3 January 2010 and 04 February 2014 as seen in satellite imagery collected by the WoldView-1 and WorldView-2 satellites respectively. During this period there was multiple new structures appeared in the area analyzed including tent shelters as well are more permanent housing. These increases in structures are most likely due to influxes of large numbers of IDPs from surrounding areas gathering in Geti. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
